name: extract_text
description: Extract text content from a PDF artifact. Use this tool when you need to read text from a PDF document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the PDF artifact to extract text from

pages.description: Optional list of page numbers (1-indexed) to extract. If not provided, extracts from all pages.

text.description: The complete extracted text from all selected pages
The extracted text from this page

pages.description: Text extracted from each page separately

name: extract_tables
description: Extract tables from a PDF artifact. Use this tool when you need to extract tabular data from a PDF document.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the PDF artifact to extract tables from

pages.description: Optional list of page numbers (1-indexed) to extract tables from. If not provided, extracts from all pages.

format.description: Output format for table data. 'json' returns array of arrays, 'markdown' returns formatted markdown table.

page_number.description: The page number (1-indexed) where the table was found

table_index.description: The index of the table on the page (0-indexed)

data.description: The table data. Array of arrays for JSON format, markdown string for markdown format.

tables.description: List of extracted tables with their locations

name: create_pdf
description: Create a PDF document from text or markdown content and save it as an artifact. Use this tool when you need to generate a PDF file.

user_id.description: The user ID who owns the artifact

project_id.description: The project ID where the artifact belongs

filename.description: The filename for the PDF (will automatically add .pdf extension if missing)

content.description: The text or markdown content to convert to PDF

format.description: The format of the input content. 'text' for plain text, 'markdown' for markdown with headings and formatting.

artifact_id.description: The unique identifier of the created artifact

s3_bucket.description: The S3 bucket where the PDF is stored

s3_key.description: The S3 key of the PDF

created_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the artifact was created
